attributes.action: Disolve Parliment and call for a general election with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition for an immediate General election so we as a country can start again from a clean sheet. After the last year of economic disaster and of the many expense scandals it is obvious that the present goverment is not fit for purpose - tainted by greed corruption and incompetence. rife with sleeze and lining its own pockets. enough is enough I demand action. Do the right thing give us our election TODAY!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
